name: RollABall (S1m0n801)
description:
RollABall is a platformer where you play as a Ball and you try to complete levels as fast as possible and compete against other players to climb the leaderboard

IMPORTANT: To use the leaderboard you must set a Playername and the option "Use Leaderboard" in the settings tab ingame!

Controls:

WASD: Move

R: Reset

ESC: Menu
